sdm.shop.render.icon.tooltip:
When you left-click, a selection menu will open where you can choose an icon from the list of items.
When you right-click, a selection menu will open where you can choose an icon from the list of textures.
sdm.shop.limiter.type.tooltip:
LocalPlayer – Restrictions will only apply to the local player.
Global – Restrictions will apply to all players on the server.
sdm.shop.tab.title: Title
sdm.shop.shop_param.change_icon_speed.to:
The rate of icon change if the product has such an option. 

It is usually used for products with the tag type and the showRandomIconFromTag parameter.
sdm.shop.shop_param.show_cant_buy.toolti: Should I display products that cannot be purchased
sdm.shop.entry.maxBuyCount.tooltip: The value that the player can buy at a time
sdm.shop.entry.buy.info.item: You buy %s in %s count. Your balance %s
sdm.shop.entry.sell.info.item: You sold %s in %s count. Your balance %s
sdm.shop.entry.seller_type.type_id.toolt:
Determines the currency or requirement for purchasing/selling items.

After changing the type, you need to apply the changes and open the menu again. Until I figured out how to update the settings window. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
sdm.shop.conditions.stages.tooltip: It only works if Game Stages or KubeJS is installed.
sdm.shop.context.edit.settings.tooltip:
Clicking the left mouse button opens the client settings menu. 
Right-clicking opens the server settings menu.

The parameters apply only to this store!
sdm.shop.modern.ui.keybinding.info.entry:
Ctrl + left click - Select entry
  +X - Swap to next clicked entry
  +Z - Move to next clicked entry
sdm.shop.modern.ui.buyer.entry.input.gho: Click. How many you wanna buy?
Click. How many you wanna sell?
sdm.shop.entry.creator.keyinfo: Click the right mouse button and you can add the button to the quick menu
sdm.shop.entry.creator.type.item.descrip: Allows you to create an item as a product. It is useful if you want to create a store where items will be sold or bought
sdm.shop.entry.creator.type.itemTag.desc: Allows you to create a product that will sell items by Tags
Allows you to create a product selling player achievements
sdm.shop.entry.creator.type.command.desc: It will allow you to put the team up for sale. To execute from the server side and not from the player, use /execute
sdm.shop.entry.creator.type.questType.de: It will allow you to create a quest as a product.
I don't know why, but why not :D
It will allow you to put stages up for sale.

Mods Support: KubeJS, GameStages, AStages
